A modular, portable housing solution that can be quickly and easily assembled in-free areas.
A smartphone app that connects homeless individuals with available housing, job opportunities, and other resources.
A community-driven initiative that provides job training and education to homeless individuals, enabling them to become self-sufficient.
A city-wide program that provides microloans to homeless individuals to start their own businesses.
